Title: Gaikotsu Kishi-sama, Tadaima Isekai e Odekakechuu
Description:
['One day, a gamer played video games until he fell asleep...and when he woke up, he found himself in the game worldâ€”as a skeleton! Equipped with the powerful weapons and armor of his avatar but stuck with its frightening skeletal appearance, Arc has to find a place for himself in this new, fantastical land. All his hopes for a quiet life are dashed when he crosses paths with a beautiful elven warrior, setting him on a journey full of conflict and adventure.', '
